references.paper_title: Training diffusion models with reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel approach of training diffusion models with reinforcement learning, which is highly relevant to the core methodology of the current paper.

references.paper_title: DreamBooth: Fine tuning text-to-image diffusion models for subject-driven generation
references.reason: This paper proposes DreamBooth, a state-of-the-art subject-driven text-to-image generation method that the current paper builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: Subject-driven text-to-image generation via apprenticeship learning
references.reason: This paper introduces SuTI, another state-of-the-art subject-driven text-to-image generation method, which is compared against in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP, a widely used metric for evaluating image-text alignment, which is used extensively in the current paper for evaluation.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), which are the foundation for many modern text-to-image diffusion models, including those used in the current paper.
